name: Rogue Depths
description:
Explore endless procedural and increasingly difficult dungeons, taking on challenging enemies and fierce underworld beasts.

IN-DEPTH CHARACTER PROGRESSION

Upgrade your character by leveling up, looting rare chests and slaying bosses. Over 80 weapon upgrades, 90 enchantments, 12 varied classes and over 80 skills and abilities to collect and unlock. Tailor your build to your play style, with the choice to change your character at anytime.

ARDUOUS ENEMIES

Over 40 different enemies to encounter. Each with their own attacks, difficulty and ratings, adapted to your characters level and dungeon difficulty. Multiple bosses also await you, guarding the rarest of treasures, but taking it wont be easy.

FEATURES

● 12 Classes
● 80+ Skills and Abilities
● Highly customization build and play style
● Up-gradable weapons
● Craft enchantments
● Brew potions
● Challenging boss fights
● Procedural generated dungeons
● Huge enemy variety
● No ads!
● No pay to win!
